title: shaco ult bug (in bots)
body:
ive been helping one of my friends level his new account in bots and ive been using shaco.

the icon for his ult changes when his clone is active and after using the ult once i can no longer cast it again. its stuck on the clone controlling icon but there is no clone. it stays this way for the remainder of the game.


after using him again, it seems like his clone never officially "dies".. it does die visually but no traps drop and it doesnt register as the end of the ability.
